item.title: About
item.description: 22, Theologian. Has been programming for 13 years, specializing himself, mainly, on PHP and correlated technology (Wordpress, Laravel). However, constantly deals with other technologies, like Python, Rust, go, Reason, Ecmascript, and ocassionaly plays with Elm, Elixir, Ruby, Hack, C, C++, C#, Dart, among others. Currently works autonomously as a web developer, and courses postgraduate studies (lato sensu) on Biblical Theology.
